name: development
description: Test against coming release of Qiskit that is currently being developed

name: stable
description: Test against the latest stable release of Qiskit

name: standard
description: Test using the lastest version required by the package. This might be different than "stable" if the package requirment is pinned.

name: last passing version
description: The last version of Qiskit for which the package is passing all their tests.
